doc:
J. B. Smoove https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._B._Smoove 0 Jerry Angelo Brooks (born December 16, 1964), widely known as J. B. Smoove, is an American actor, writer, comedian, and voice actor. He started his career off with the television series Def Comedy Jam in 1995. He is best known for his role as Leon on the HBO series Curb Your Enthusiasm. He also starred on the CBS sitcom The Millers from 2013 to 2015. He most recently portrayed a fictionalized version of himself on the BET improv-comedy reality television parody Real Husbands of Hollywood. Jerry_Angelo_Brooks ( born December_16_,_1964 ) , widely_known as J._B._Smoove , is an_American_actor , writer , comedian , and voice_actor . He started his_career off with the_television_series_Def_Comedy_Jam in 1995 . He is_best_known for his_role as Leon on the_HBO_series_Curb Your_Enthusiasm . He also starred on the_CBS_sitcom The_Millers from 2013 to 2015 . He most_recently portrayed a_fictionalized_version of himself on the_BET_improv-comedy_reality_television_parody_Real_Husbands of Hollywood .
